# Blinding (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
A shield with this ability flashes with a brilliant light up to twice per day upon command of the wielder. Except for the wielder, anyone within 20 feet must make a DC 14 Reflex save or be [[Blinded|blinded]] for 1d4 rounds.

Moderate evocation*;* CL 7th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Searing Light (Spell)|searing light]]**;* Price +1 bonus.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 462
